sn10.8:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati sitavane.
sn10.8:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena anathapindiko gahapati rajagaham anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaniyena.
sn10.8:1.5: Tavadeva ca pana bhagavantam dassanaya upasankamitukamo hoti. Athassa anathapindikassa gahapatissa etadahosi:
sn10.8:1.7: Sve danaham kalena bhagavantam dassanaya gamissami”ti buddhagataya satiya nipajji.
sn10.8:1.8: Rattiya sudam tikkhattum vutthasi pabhatanti mannamano.
sn10.8:1.9: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena sivathikadvaram tenupasankami.
sn10.8:1.11: Atha kho anathapindikassa gahapatissa nagaramha nikkhamantassa aloko antaradhayi, andhakaro paturahosi, bhayam chambhitattam lomahamso udapadi, tatova puna nivattitukamo ahosi.
sn10.8:1.12: Atha kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussavesi:
sn10.8:4.1: Atha kho anathapindikassa gahapatissa andhakaro antaradhayi, aloko paturahosi, yam ahosi bhayam chambhitattam lomahamso, so patippassambhi.
sn10.8:4.2: Dutiyampi kho anathapindikassa gahapatissa aloko antaradhayi, andhakaro paturahosi, bhayam chambhitattam lomahamso udapadi, tatova puna nivattitukamo ahosi.
sn10.8:4.3: Dutiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussavesi:
sn10.8:7.1: Atha kho anathapindikassa gahapatissa andhakaro antaradhayi, aloko paturahosi, yam ahosi bhayam chambhitattam lomahamso, so patippassambhi.
sn10.8:7.2: Tatiyampi kho anathapindikassa gahapatissa aloko antaradhayi, andhakaro paturahosi, bhayam chambhitattam lomahamso udapadi, tatova puna nivattitukamo ahosi.
sn10.8:7.3: Tatiyampi kho sivako yakkho antarahito saddamanussavesi:
sn10.8:10.1: Atha kho anathapindikassa gahapatissa andhakaro antaradhayi, aloko paturahosi, yam ahosi bhayam chambhitattam lomahamso, so patippassambhi.
sn10.8:10.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena sitavanam yena bhagava tenupasankami.
sn10.8:11.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava rattiya paccusasamayam paccutthaya abbhokase cankamati.
sn10.8:11.2: Addasa kho bhagava anathapindikam gahapatim duratova agacchantam.
sn10.8:11.3: Disvana cankama orohitva pannatte asane nisidi.
sn10.8:11.4: Nisajja kho bhagava anathapindikam gahapatim etadavoca:
sn10.8:11.6: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati, namena mam bhagava alapatiti, hattho udaggo tattheva bhagavato padesu sirasa nipatitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
